ModMetaData.name: Turrets Hate Prisoners
ModMetaData.author: Solra Bizna
ModMetaData.description:
Until 1.3, turrets would happily attack escaping prisoners. Something in 1.3 changed that. This mod makes it so that any turret will consider any escaping prisoner, rebelling slave, or "panic-fleeing" pawn as a valid target.
I spent much more time writing this than testing it, but it seems to work. Enjoy.
